custom_fields.label: Travel Claim
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-section_break_3

custom_fields.description: Mention the start date for the expense claim getting filed
custom_fields.label: Expense Start Date
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-start_date

custom_fields.description: Mention the end date for the expense claim getting filed
custom_fields.label: Expense End Date
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-end_date

custom_fields.description: Mention the start location of travel/location of hotel/location of expense for claim
custom_fields.label: Start Location
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-travel_location

custom_fields.description: Mention the order/bill number of the item. This field is always mandatory for all the non travel and hotel bills
custom_fields.label: Order/Bill Number
custom_fields.mandatory_depends_on:
eval:doc.expense_type=='Safety Items(with GST)' 
    || doc.expense_type=='Consumables(with GST)'
    || doc.expense_type=='Hotel/Room Accommodation(with GST)'
    || doc.expense_type=='Miscellaneous(with GST)'
    || doc.expense_type=='DP Chemical(with GST)'
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-order_number

custom_fields.description: Calculated number of days for which claim is mentioned
custom_fields.label: Total Days
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-total_days

custom_fields.description: Mention the end location of the travel
custom_fields.label: End Location
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-end_location

custom_fields.description: Check the box if the claim amount is mentioned for both to and from of the travel together
custom_fields.label: Includes Return Travel
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-includes_return_travel

custom_fields.description: Select the option of mode of travel
custom_fields.label: Model of Travel
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-model_of_travel
custom_fields.options:
Auto/Taxi
Bus
Train
Rickshaw
Flight
Others

custom_fields.description: Mention the name of the accommodation/hotel stayed
custom_fields.label: Hotel Name
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-hotel_name

custom_fields.description: Calculated number of days for which hotel claim is mentioned
custom_fields.label: Number of days
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-number_of_days

custom_fields.description: Mention the actual room rate paid per day for all rooms together. Ensure to add the hotel bill as attachment.
custom_fields.label: Total Room Rate Per Day
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-room_rate_per_day

custom_fields.description: Calculates the amount that exceeds the per day amount of Rs 500
custom_fields.label: Excess Amount
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-excess_amount

custom_fields.depends_on:
eval:doc.expense_type != "Conveyance Cost in Delhi" &&
      doc.expense_type != "Travelling" &&
      doc.expense_type != "Hotel/Room Accommodation(with GST)" &&
      doc.expense_type != "Hotel/Room Accommodation(without GST)"
custom_fields.label: Others
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-miscellaneous_claim

custom_fields.description: Mandatory in case of all expenses except travel and hotel. Mention the item for which claim is raised along with the bill attached
custom_fields.label: Item Name
custom_fields.mandatory_depends_on:
eval:doc.expense_type!='Miscellaneous(with GST)' && 
doc.expense_type!='Miscellaneous(without GST)' &&
doc.expense_type!='Travelling' &&
doc.expense_type!='Conveyance Cost in Delhi' &&
doc.expense_type!='Hotel/Room Accommodation(with GST)' &&
doc.expense_type!='Hotel/Room Accommodation(without GST)'
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-item_name

custom_fields.description: Mandatory if bill is taxable
custom_fields.label: Vendor Address
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-vendor_address

custom_fields.description: Select if the expense bill is taxable
custom_fields.label: Bill is taxable
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-bill_is_taxable

custom_fields.description: Mention the amount of the item excluding gst if the bill is taxable
custom_fields.label: Principal Amount
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-principal_amount

custom_fields.description: Mention the vendor gst number if the bill is taxable.
custom_fields.label: Vendor GST Number
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-vendor_gst_number

custom_fields.description: Mention the IGST present in the taxable bill
custom_fields.label: IGST Value
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-igst_value

custom_fields.description: Mention the total cost for all taxi/auto together per day that is to be claimed
custom_fields.label: Per Day Total Cost of Taxi/Auto
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-per_day_total_cost_of_taxi

custom_fields.description: Mention the number of taxi/auto for which the claim is raised
custom_fields.label: Number of Taxi/Auto
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-number_of_taxi

custom_fields.description: Mention the number of rooms for which the claim is added
custom_fields.label: Total Number of Rooms
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-total_number_of_rooms

custom_fields.label: Item Name
custom_fields.name: Expense Claim Detail-miscellaneous_items
custom_fields.options:
Coolie
Medical
IBR Coordinator
Labour Charges

property_setters.name: Expense Claim Detail-description-description
property_setters.value: Attach the bill/proof for the claim

property_setters.name: Expense Claim Detail-expense_date-description
property_setters.value: Mention the date of expense done
